title: SourceLens: LLM-Based Assistant for Paper Reading
summary: A CSCI 8615 project that unifies paper reading, citation exploration, and LLM evidence in a single interactive canvas.
bullets: Designed the full interface layout and interaction flow through iterative sketches and UI prototypes.
Conducted user research by observing a participant using the app and identifying usability improvements for a more intuitive experience.
Built the keyword filter feature, enabling users to click a keyword and instantly surface all references containing it.
Implemented the favorites system for saving papers users want to revisit later.
Created the overview panel, allowing users to quickly browse all paper sections and jump directly to any chapter.
